name: The NAV Project
description:
Explore the Void like never before!  This interactive application  will allow you to control a robot to safely roam the Void!  Standard interdimensional laws apply.

Side effects may include: ritualistic chanting, seeing strange shapes out of the corner of your eye, sliding into the Void, seeing Void Beasts, the ability to manipulate the Void, and Death.

If you experience any of the aforementioned effects, please contact your nearest Void Walker.

This description has been brought to you by The Navigator Foundation.
